HomePage_8cafddf1f38553da9203dc32446deef.description: The home page of the Demoblaze online store, showcasing featured products and categories.

elements.name: Product Store Title
elements.description: The title of the store.

elements.name: Home Link
elements.description: Link to the home page.

elements.name: Contact Link
elements.description: Link to the contact page.

elements.name: About us Link
elements.description: Link to the about us page.

elements.name: Cart Link
elements.description: Link to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Log in Link
elements.description: Link to the login page.

elements.name: Sign up Link
elements.description: Link to the sign up page.

elements.name: Phones Category
elements.description: Link to the phones category.

elements.name: Laptops Category
elements.description: Link to the laptops category.

elements.name: Monitors Category
elements.description: Link to the monitors category.

elements.name: Next Product
elements.description: Button to navigate to the next product in the carousel.

elements.name: Previous Product
elements.description: Button to navigate to the previous product in the carousel.

assertions: Verify the 'Product Store' title is visible
Verify at least one product is displayed

DemoblazePage_63093eca1a95fe9da9a61e9e52.description: This page displays the details of a specific product on the Demoblaze e-commerce site.

elements.name: Product Title
elements.description: The title of the product being displayed.

elements.name: Product Price
elements.description: The price of the product.

elements.name: Product Description
elements.description: Detailed description of the product.

elements.name: Add to cart button
elements.description: Button to add the product to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Product Image
elements.description: Main image of the product.

elements.name: Categories - Phones
elements.description: Link to navigate to the phones category.

elements.name: Categories - Laptops
elements.description: Link to navigate to the laptops category.

elements.name: Categories - Monitors
elements.description: Link to navigate to the monitors category.

assertions: Verify that the product title is displayed.
Verify that the product price is displayed.
Verify that the product description is displayed.
Verify that the 'Add to cart' button is present.
Verify that the product image is displayed.

ProductDetailsSonyVaioI5Page_fc37ec213a7.description: This page displays the details of a specific product, in this case, the Sony Vaio i5 laptop. It includes the product name, price, description, and an 'Add to cart' button.

elements.name: Product Name
elements.description: The name of the product.

elements.name: Product Price
elements.description: The price of the product.

elements.name: Product Description
elements.description: The description of the product.

elements.name: Add to cart
elements.description: Button to add the product to the shopping cart.

assertions: Verify the page title contains 'PRODUCT STORE'
Verify the product name is 'Sony vaio i5'
Verify the 'Add to cart' button is present

CartPage_d75ab4b6a34d52bba8db16a030a9891.description: This page displays the user's cart and allows them to place an order by filling out the 'Place Order' form.

elements.name: Place Order Button
elements.description: Button to open the 'Place Order' form.

elements.name: Place Order Modal
elements.description: The 'Place Order' dialog/modal.

elements.name: Place Order Modal Title
elements.description: Title of the 'Place Order' modal.

elements.name: Name Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's name.

elements.name: Country Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's country.

elements.name: City Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's city.

elements.name: Credit Card Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's credit card number.

elements.name: Month Input
elements.description: Input field for the credit card expiration month.

elements.name: Year Input
elements.description: Input field for the credit card expiration year.

elements.name: Purchase Button
elements.description: Button to submit the order.

elements.name: Close Button
elements.description: Button to close the 'Place Order' modal.

HomePage_21dec0176c3bb19d5e44efd8b30341e.description: This is the homepage for Dyson India. The primary purpose is to showcase Dyson products and provide navigation to different product categories and information.

elements.name: Dyson Logo
elements.description: Dyson logo that navigates to the homepage.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Shop Now Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page featured in the hero section.

elements.name: Cart Icon
elements.description: Link to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Deals Link
elements.description: Link to the deals page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners page.

elements.name: Hair care Link
elements.description: Link to the hair care products page.

elements.name: Air purifier Link
elements.description: Link to the air purifier products page.

elements.name: Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the headphones products page.

elements.name: Lighting Link
elements.description: Link to the lighting products page.

elements.name: Support Link
elements.description: Link to the support page.

elements.name: Best sellers Link
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

assertions: Hero section text contains 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.'
At least one product category link is visible (e.g., 'Vacuum & wet cleaners')
